snippet: Organizers of the first New York Ironman triathlon considered canceling the swim segment of Saturday’s race after a sewage spill in the Hudson River earlier this week.
lead_paragraph: Organizers of the first New York Ironman triathlon considered canceling the swim segment of Saturday’s race after a sewage spill in the Hudson River earlier this week.

headline.main: Ironman Will Proceed After Hudson River Is Declared Safe
headline.print_headline: Ironman Will Proceed After Hudson River Is Declared Safe
